Key Match Events: New Zealand needed 26 to win in the last over but failed
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and chose to bat
England’s quicks fared better: Wood 1 for 25 from three overs, Curran 2 for 26 from four, Woakes 2 for 33 from four
England’s spinners were also good though, Rashid creating a lot of the mid-innings squeeze, Livingstone doing a job, and for me, the early use of Moeen tilted the match
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler is player of the match
England keep their T20 World Cup hopes alive with the victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weather or field conditions did not significantly affect the match
The attendance for the match was 22,547
This was part of the T20 World Cup Super 12s
